Another tow truck driver was charged with unauthorized use of vehicles last fall after police said he had been coordinating with a Portland city employee to tow cars tagged as abandoned and selling them to the two North Columbia Boulevard auto chop shops .
The city employee pleaded guilty to official misconduct and other charges Friday and will be sentenced June 19 .
